\Genetsis\core

\Genetsis\coreLogConfig

This class stores the configuration for objects for logging.

Tags

None found

configure()

configure(\LoggerHierarchy  $hierarchy, mixed  $input = null) : void

Initialize objects for logging. We have two logs files: - gid-last-request.log: to see logger for the last request - gid-all-requests.log: to see all logger for all request

All configurators implementations must implement this interface.

Parameters

\LoggerHierarchy $hierarchy

The hierarchy on which to perform the configuration.
mixed $input

Either path to the config file or the configuration as an array.
